content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Butterfingers You drop the weapon you made the attack with. Melee
Snapped String If the attack used a weapon in the bow group, the string snaps, requiring 3 Interact actions to fix. Ranged
Torn Muscle Until healed, you are enfeebled 1. Unarmed
Magic Fatigue You can't cast any spells until the end of your next turn. Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #13
